short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirects users who visit 'amazon.com' to the corresponding 'smile.amazon.com' page
short.no: Automatisk omdirigerer brukere som bes√∏ker 'amazon.com' til den tilsvarende 'smile.amazon.com' siden

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of having to remember to go to a particular domain to donate to your favorite charity? Well no more! Get automatically redirected to the subdomain that will donate a portion of your purchase to your favorite charity, without needing to worry about anything. 

This extension is unobtrusive and requires no extra steps or set-up. Just install it and forget about it.

We collect no data - no anonymized data, no personal data, nothing. We have no trackers, and we don't modify the contents of the page - we simply redirect you. Want to check for yourself? Our source code is available on GitHub: https://github.com/arcrozier/amazon-smile-redirect
